title: A Year of Spanish
description: Alyssa Kessler enters her senior year at Lynn Creek High School prepared to graduate at the top of her class. No distractions. But she didn't count on meeting Se√±or Brown, her new Spanish teacher... Now everything is getting complicated. Not only is it getting harder to ignore her growing attraction to him, her mind is telling her that he feels something too. But it's just her imagination. Or is it? A Year of Spanish will leave you guessing what is real, what is not, and whether it's possible to meet the right person... at the wrong time.
author: Cora Grove Clarke
